001package andesite.player.filter;
002
003import andesite.util.FilterUtil;
004import com.github.natanbc.lavadsp.timescale.TimescalePcmAudioFilter;
005import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.filter.AudioFilter;
006import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.filter.FloatPcmAudioFilter;
007import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.format.AudioDataFormat;
008import io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject;
009
010import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
011import javax.annotation.Nullable;
012
013public class TimescaleConfig implements Config {
014    private float speed = 1f;
015    private float pitch = 1f;
016    private float rate = 1f;
017    
018    public float speed() {
019        return speed;
020    }
021    
022    public void setSpeed(float speed) {
023        if(speed <= 0) {
024            throw new IllegalArgumentException("speed <= 0");
025        }
026        this.speed = speed;
027    }
028    
029    public float pitch() {
030        return pitch;
031    }
032    
033    public void setPitch(float pitch) {
034        if(pitch <= 0) {
035            throw new IllegalArgumentException("pitch <= 0");
036        }
037        this.pitch = pitch;
038    }
039    
040    public float rate() {
041        return rate;
042    }
043    
044    public void setRate(float rate) {
045        if(rate <= 0) {
046            throw new IllegalArgumentException("rate <= 0");
047        }
048        this.rate = rate;
049    }
050    
051    @Nonnull
052    @Override
053    public String name() {
054        return "timescale";
055    }
056    
057    @Override
058    public boolean enabled() {
059        return FilterUtil.TIMESCALE_AVAILABLE &&
060            (Config.isSet(speed, 1f) || Config.isSet(pitch, 1f) || Config.isSet(rate, 1f));
061    }
062    
063    @Nullable
064    @Override
065    public AudioFilter create(AudioDataFormat format, FloatPcmAudioFilter output) {
066        return new TimescalePcmAudioFilter(output, format.channelCount, format.sampleRate)
067            .setSpeed(speed)
068            .setPitch(pitch)
069            .setRate(rate);
070    }
071    
072    @Nonnull
073    @Override
074    public JsonObject encode() {
075        return new JsonObject()
076            .put("speed", speed)
077            .put("pitch", pitch)
078            .put("rate", rate);
079    }
080}
